title: Facebook says data leak hits 87 million users
text:
Facebook says data leak hits 87 million users Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:52 
Facebook said on Wednesday that the personal information of up to 87 million users may have been improperly shared with political consultancy Cambridge Analytica, up from a previous news media estimate of more than 50 million.   
Facebook said on Wednesday that the personal information of up to 87 million users may have been improperly shared with political consultancy Cambridge Analytica, up from a previous news media estimate of more than 50 million.  //reut.rs/2H8WG0C
